name: Sacrificial Wool
description:
Is your PC powerful enough to save the village?

Play as the sacrificial lamb in Ultra High Definition Graphics and reach the altar before your PC spontaneously combusts.

Boasting a smooth 2000 fps limit, heavenly orchestral movements and RTX on, this game has it all.*

*terms subject to hyperbole

Sacrifice the lamb, save the world.

Controls
-------------
WASD - Movement
Space Bar - Advances text
Toggle Settings - Advances game
Escape - Quit Game
R key - Reset Level
